column5: Our front row beach house was recently remodeled with interior paint, flooring, fixtures, furnishings, etc. Family and child friendly!  This spacious 4 bedroom, 3 bath home is one of the largest rentals in the area with almost 1600 sq. ft.! Sleeps 10 in beds, 2 on the queen sized sofa pull out bed, and 1 in the Pack & Play. There is also an pull out couch for additional sleeping.
